heading: Identification
text:
All business vehicles, advertising, websites and stationery used in connection with a master fire
   suppression piping contractor business shall display prominently the full name of the licensee, the words “N.Y.C. licensed fi re
   suppression piping contractor – class A, B or C,” the licensee’s number and the licensee’s business address. If the business is
   conducted under a trade name, or by a partnership or corporation, the trade name, partnership or corporate name shall be plac ed
   immediately above the full name or names of the licensed master fire suppression piping contractor or licensed master fire
   suppression piping contractors to whom the plates were issued.
